rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0004
rows.name:
Time for the final confrontation
with Metsu.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0005
rows.name:
The preparations for the evacuation of
Iira are well underway.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0006
rows.name:
We managed to circumvent a lot of the
difficulties, thanks to Laura

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0007
rows.name:
Our chances in a confrontation with
Metsu seem to grow ever larger.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0009
rows.name:
But Metsu isn't just going to wait for us
forever.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0010
rows.name:
And I feel like I'm gonna get pins and
needles if I have to sit on my hands
any longer.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0011
rows.name:
We need to face up to this now.
It's make or break time.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0012
rows.name:
His Majesty puts forth that we should
return briefly to the capital.

rows.label: campfev11_3650_msg0013
rows.name: Well, let's head out there then!
